channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock futures inch higher, but Biden‚Äôs withdrawal adds to increasingly uncertain outlook for markets
item.description: President Joe Biden has officially dropped out of the race for president, injecting even more uncertainty into the outlook for markets at an increasingly critical juncture.

item.description: Foreign leaders reacted to U.S. President Joe Biden's decision to exit the presidential race.

item.title: China‚Äôs central bank cuts key policy rate in surprise move
item.description: China‚Äôs central bank unexpectedly cut a key policy rate to support the country‚Äôs ailing economy, just days after a flurry of data showed that a lopsided recovery might have lost some steam.

item.title: Biden drops out of 2024 presidential election, endorses Kamala Harris as Democratic nominee
item.description: President Joe Biden made the decision to quit the election race against Donald Trump after weeks of pressure by a growing number of Democrats.

item.title: Asia stocks fall as Biden drops presidential bid; China unexpectedly cuts interest rates
item.description: "It is in the best interest of my party and the country for me to stand down and to focus solely on fulfilling my duties as President,‚Äù Biden wrote in a letter.

item.title: Nippon Steel hires Mike Pompeo as adviser to seal U.S. Steel deal
item.description: Nippon Steel has hired former U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo as an adviser, as part of efforts to complete its plan to acquire U.S. Steel.

item.title: Here‚Äôs how stocks performed the last time a president ended a re-election bid ‚Äî in 1968
item.description: Stocks rose after LBJ‚Äôs surprise announcement, but this time the market had already priced in Biden‚Äôs withdrawal.

item.description: President Joe Biden announced on Sunday he will not be seeking reelection.

item.title: Biden is in line for a pension of up to $413,000 a year
item.description: That should help cushion the blow now that President Joe Biden has canceled his re-election bid and endorsed Kamala Harris to replace him.

item.title: Boeing 'disappointed' customers but is on the path to 'transformational change,' commercial jet CEO says
item.description: Boeing's troubled 737 Max has been at the center of a safety crisis at the company after a door plug blew out midair earlier this year.

item.title: Kamala Harris sees surge in big money support after Biden drops out of race
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris is already taking control of Joe Biden's massive campaign war chest after his departure from the 2024 race.
